text: Next Time I'll Aim for the Heart () is a 2014 French thriller film written and directed by Cédric Anger. It was adapted from the novel Un assassin au-dessus de tout soupçon by Yvan Stefanovitch. Set in 1970s Oise, France, it is based on the story of Alain Lamare, a gendarme who was later revealed to be a serial killer. == Cast == * Guillaume Canet as Franck * Jean-Paul Comart as Franck's father * Hélène Vauquois as Franck's mother * Ana Girardot as Sophie * Jean- Yves Berteloot as Lacombe * Patrick Azam as Tonton * Cédric Le Maoût as Olivier * Alice de Lencquesaing as Melissa * Nicolas Ronchi as the doctor * Nicolas Carpentier as Paul * Alexandre Carrière as Ossart * Franck Andrieux as Auzier * Arthur Dujardin as Bruno * Pierick Tournier as Carpentier * Laura Giudice as Roxane == Accolades == In January 2015, the film received two nominations at the 20th Lumières Awards.
